channel.title: SNCR Plugins
channel.description: A plugin of Sketch actions which are useful in the workflows of the designers at Synchronoss Technologies Inc.

item.title: Version 0.66
item.description: • Added new functionality for annotations; designate selections as annotations, link selected annotation and object/artboard, and update all annotations on page. Creating and updating annotations will also draw links between annotations and linked object/artboard.
